tag.description: InputText is an extension to standard inputText with skinning capabilities.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Value of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: When set true, process validations logic is executed at apply request values phase for this component. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Marks component as required.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: A method expression referring to a method validationg the input.
attribute.name: validator

attribute.description: A method binding expression referring to a method for handling a valuchangeevent.
attribute.name: valueChangeListener

attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when conversion fails.
attribute.name: converterMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when validation fails.
attribute.name: validatorMessage

attribute.description: Access key to transfer focus to the input element.
attribute.name: accesskey

attribute.description: Alternate textual description of the input element.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: Controls browser autocomplete behavior.
attribute.name: autocomplete

attribute.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality.
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: Disables the input element, default is false.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: A localized user presentable name.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: A localized user presentable name.
attribute.name: lang

attribute.description: Maximum number of characters that may be entered in this field.
attribute.name: maxlength

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element loses focus.
attribute.name: onblur

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element loses focus and its value has been modified since gaining focus.
attribute.name: onchange

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element is clicked.
attribute.name: onclick

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element is double clicked.
attribute.name: ondblclick

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element receives focus.
attribute.name: onfocus

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed down over input element.
attribute.name: onkeydown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed and released over input element.
attribute.name: onkeypress

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is released over input element.
attribute.name: onkeyup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is pressed down over input element.
attribute.name: onmousedown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved within input element.
attribute.name: onmousemove

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved away from input element.
attribute.name: onmouseout

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is moved onto input element.
attribute.name: onmouseover

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer input element is released over input element.
attribute.name: onmouseup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when text within input element is selected by user.
attribute.name: onselect

attribute.description: Flag indicating that this input element will prevent changes by the user.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Number of characters used to determine the width of the input element.
attribute.name: size

attribute.description: Inline style of the component.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the component.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip information.
attribute.name: tabindex

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip information.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: The placeholder attribute specifies a short hint that describes the expected value of an input field.
attribute.name: placeholder

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Input field type. Default is text.
attribute.name: type

tag.description: This is an html body tag activating the AngularJS framework.

attribute.description: Optional: name of the AngularJS application.
attribute.name: ng-app

attribute.description: Name of the AngularJS controller class.
attribute.name: ng-controller

tag.description: CommandButton is an extended version of standard JSF commandButton with ajax and skinning features.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Label of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An actionlistener to process when command is executed.
attribute.name: actionListener

attribute.description: A method expression or a string outcome to process when command is executed.
attribute.name: action

attribute.description: Boolean value that determines the phaseId of the action event, when true actions are processed at "Apply Request Values", when false at "Invoke Application" phase.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Specifies the submit mode, when set to true (default), submit would be made with Ajax.
attribute.name: ajax

attribute.description: When set to true, ajax requests are not queued.
attribute.name: async

attribute.description: Component(s) to process partially instead of whole view.
attribute.name: process

attribute.description: Component(s) to be updated with ajax.
attribute.name: update

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute before ajax request is begins.
attribute.name: onstart

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when ajax request is completed.
attribute.name: oncomplete

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when ajax request fails.
attribute.name: onerror

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when ajax request succeeds.
attribute.name: onsuccess

attribute.description: Defines whether to trigger ajaxStatus or not.
attribute.name: global

attribute.description: When enabled, only values related to partially processed components would be serialized for ajax instead of whole form.
attribute.name: partialSubmit

attribute.description: Access key that when pressed transfers focus to the button.
attribute.name: accesskey

attribute.description: Alternate textual description of the button.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are LTR and RTL.
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: Disables the button.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Style class representing the button icon.
attribute.name: image

attribute.description: A localized user presentable name.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.
attribute.name: lang

attribute.description: Position of the button element in the tabbing order.
attribute.name: tabindex

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip informaton.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Sets the behavior of the button. Default is submit.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Flag indicating that this component will prevent changes by the user.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Inline style of the button element.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the button element.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when button loses focus.
attribute.name: onblur

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when button loses focus and its value has been modified since gaining focus.
attribute.name: onchange

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when button is clicked.
attribute.name: onclick

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when button is double clicked.
attribute.name: ondblclick

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when button receives focus.
attribute.name: onfocus

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed down over button.
attribute.name: onkeydown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is pressed and released over button.
attribute.name: onkeypress

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a key is released over button.
attribute.name: onkeyup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is pressed down over button.
attribute.name: onmousedown

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved within button.
attribute.name: onmousemove

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved away from button.
attribute.name: onmouseout

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved onto button.
attribute.name: onmouseover

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is released over button.
attribute.name: onmouseup

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when text within button is selected by user.
attribute.name: onselect

attribute.description: Icon of the button.
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Position of the icon, default value is left.
attribute.name: iconPos

attribute.description: Displays button inline instead of fitting the content width, only used by mobile.
attribute.name: inline

attribute.description: Defines if label of the component is escaped or not.
attribute.name: escape

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Specifies if the summary of the FacesMessage should be displayed. Default is false.
attribute.name: showSummary

attribute.description: Specifies if the summary of the FacesMessage should be displayed. Default is true.
attribute.name: showDetail

attribute.description: Identifier of the component whose messages to display only, takes precendence when used with globalOnly.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: Defines if already rendered messages should be displayed. Default is true.
attribute.name: redisplay

attribute.description: Defines display mode, valid values are text, icon and both(default).
attribute.name: display

attribute.description: Defines whether html would be escaped or not, defaults to true.
attribute.name: escape

attribute.description: Comma seperated list of severities to display only.
attribute.name: severity

tag.description: AngularButton is non-JSF button calling an AngularJS controller function. It replaces the form's ng-submit attribute which doesn't work well in a JSF environment.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Angular function.
attribute.name: ng-function

attribute.description: Label of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Access key that when pressed transfers focus to the button.
attribute.name: accesskey

attribute.description: Alternate textual description of the button.
attribute.name: alt

attribute.description: Direction indication for text that does not inherit directionality. Valid values are LTR and RTL.
attribute.name: dir

attribute.description: Disables the button.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Style class representing the button icon.
attribute.name: image

attribute.description: A localized user presentable name.
attribute.name: label

attribute.description: Code describing the language used in the generated markup for this component.
attribute.name: lang

attribute.description: Position of the button element in the tabbing order.
attribute.name: tabindex

attribute.description: Advisory tooltip informaton.
attribute.name: title

attribute.description: Flag indicating that this component will prevent changes by the user.
attribute.name: readonly

attribute.description: Inline style of the button element.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the button element.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when button loses focus.
attribute.name: onblur

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when input element receives focus.
attribute.name: onfocus

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved within button.
attribute.name: onmousemove

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved away from button.
attribute.name: onmouseout

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when a pointer button is moved onto button.
attribute.name: onmouseover

attribute.description: Icon of the button.
attribute.name: icon

attribute.description: Position of the icon, default value is left.
attribute.name: iconPos

attribute.description: Displays button inline instead of fitting the content width, only used by mobile.
attribute.name: inline

attribute.description: Defines if label of the component is escaped or not.
attribute.name: escape

tag.description: This is an enhanced Primefaces SelectBooleanCheckbox with built-in AngularJS support.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Value of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: An el expression or a literal text that defines a converter for the component. When it's an EL expression, it's resolved to a converter instance. In case it's a static text, it must refer to a converter id.
attribute.name: converter

attribute.description: When set true, process validations logic is executed at apply request values phase for this component. Default is false.
attribute.name: immediate

attribute.description: Marks component as required.
attribute.name: required

attribute.description: A method expression referring to a method validationg the input.
attribute.name: validator

attribute.description: A method binding expression referring to a method for handling a valuchangeevent.
attribute.name: valueChangeListener

attribute.description: Message to display when required field validation fails.
attribute.name: requiredMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when conversion fails.
attribute.name: converterMessage

attribute.description: Message to display when validation fails.
attribute.name: validatorMessage

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Label to display next to checkbox.
attribute.name: itemLabel

attribute.description: The tabindex attribute specifies the tab order of an element when the "tab" button is used for navigating.
attribute.name: tabindex

tag.description: DataTable is an enhanced version of the standard Datatable that provides built-in solutions to many commons use cases like paging, sorting, selection, lazy loading, filtering and more.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Datasource of the component.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: Name of the iterator variable used to refer each data.
attribute.name: var

attribute.description: Number of rows to display per page. Default value is 0 meaning to display all data available.
attribute.name: rows

attribute.description: Index of the first data to display.
attribute.name: first

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Enables pagination. Default is false.
attribute.name: paginator

attribute.description: Template of the paginator.
attribute.name: paginatorTemplate

attribute.description: Template of the rowsPerPage dropdown.
attribute.name: rowsPerPageTemplate

attribute.description: Template of the currentPageReport UI.
attribute.name: currentPageReportTemplate

attribute.description: Maximum number of page links to display. Default is 10.
attribute.name: pageLinks

attribute.description: Position of the paginator. Default is both.
attribute.name: paginatorPosition

attribute.description: Defines if paginator should be hidden if total data count is less than number of rows per page. Default is true.
attribute.name: paginatorAlwaysVisible

attribute.description: Makes data scrollable with fixed header. Default is false.
attribute.name: scrollable

attribute.description: Height in pixels for scrollable data.
attribute.name: scrollHeight

attribute.description: Width in pixels for scrollable data.
attribute.name: scrollWidth

attribute.description: Enables data selection, valid values are "single" and "multiple".
attribute.name: selectionMode

attribute.description: Reference to the selection data.
attribute.name: selection

attribute.description: Name of iterator to refer each row index.
attribute.name: rowIndexVar

attribute.description: Text to display when there is no data to display. Default is "No records found."
attribute.name: emptyMessage

attribute.description: Inline style of the main container.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the main container.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Enables live scrolling. Default is false.
attribute.name: liveScroll

attribute.description: Style class for each row.
attribute.name: rowStyleClass

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute before row expansion.
attribute.name: onExpandStart

attribute.description: Decides whether datatable columns are resizable or not.
attribute.name: resizableColumns

attribute.description: Property to be used for default sorting.
attribute.name: sortBy

attribute.description: Sets sorting order. Default is "ascending"
attribute.name: sortOrder

attribute.description: Custom pluggable sortFunction for default sorting.
attribute.name: sortFunction

attribute.description: Unique identifier of row data.
attribute.name: rowKey

attribute.description: Client side event to invoke datatable filtering for input fields. Default is keyup.
attribute.name: filterEvent

attribute.description: Delay to wait in milliseconds before sending each filter query. Default is 300.
attribute.name: filterDelay

attribute.description: Inline style of the table element.
attribute.name: tableStyle

attribute.description: Style class of the table element.
attribute.name: tableStyleClass

attribute.description: Decides whether datatable columns can be reordered using dragdrop.
attribute.name: draggableColumns

attribute.description: Controls incell editing.
attribute.name: editable

attribute.description: Defines if lazy loading is enabled for the data component.
attribute.name: lazy

attribute.description: List to keep the filtered data if filtering is enabled.
attribute.name: filteredValue

tag.description: AngularFaces' Slider is just an ordinary PrimeFaces Slider. It updates the Angular models when the slider is moved. Slider is used to provide input with various customization options like orientation, display modes and skinning.

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false component will not be rendered.
attribute.name: rendered

attribute.description: An el expression referring to a server side UIComponent instance in a backing bean.
attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Name of the client side widget.
attribute.name: widgetVar

attribute.description: Id of the input text that the slider will be used for.
attribute.name: for

attribute.description: Id of the component to display the slider value.
attribute.name: display

attribute.description: Minimum value of the slider. Default is 0.
attribute.name: minValue

attribute.description: Maximum value of the slider. Default is 100.
attribute.name: maxValue

attribute.description: Inline style of the container element.
attribute.name: style

attribute.description: Style class of the container element.
attribute.name: styleClass

attribute.description: Boolean value to enable/disable the animated move when background of slider is clicked. Default is true.
attribute.name: animate

attribute.description: Sets the type of the slider, "horizontal" or "vertical". Default is horizontal.
attribute.name: type

attribute.description: Fixed pixel increments that the slider move in. Default is 1.
attribute.name: step

attribute.description: Disables or enables the slider.
attribute.name: disabled

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when slide begins.
attribute.name: onSlideStart

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute during sliding.
attribute.name: onSlide

attribute.description: Client side callback to execute when slide ends.
attribute.name: onSlideEnd
